# center

**Instance Property**

The center point of the region.

## Declaration

```swift
center: Coordinate;
```

## Discussion

Create a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Coordinate] with a latitude and longitude pair:

```javascript
const center = new mapkit.Coordinate(37.415, -122.048333); // latitude, longitude
```

## Defining the region

- **span**: The horizontal and vertical span representing the amount of map to display.

items.description: The horizontal and vertical span representing the amount of map to display.
